patterns: Tell me about Chandigarh University
Give me information about Chandigarh University
responses: Chandigarh University) is an engineering college in Gharuan, India recognized by All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE) and affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad.

patterns: What are different clubs in college?
what are extra-circular activities in college?
clubs in CU
responses: There are 9 clubs 1)STENTORIAN - ENGLISH LITERATURE CLUB 2) VIGNANA JYOTHI SAHITIVANAM - TELUGU LITERATURE CLUB ;3)VJ THEATRO ; 4) DRAMATRIX;5)SCINTILLATE -PHOTOGRAPHY;6)CREATIVE ARTS - ARTS CLUB; 7)LIWE WIRE- DANCE CLUB ; 8) NSS - SOCIAL SERVICE CLUB ; 9)CRESCENDO- MUSIC CLUB
There are total 9 extra circular activities clubs in Chandigarh University and many more co circular clubs.

patterns: What are the literary clubs in college?
How many literary clubs are there in college?
What are the literature clubs in college?
responses:
There are two literary clubs in Chandigarh University
 1.Stentorian-English Literature club 
 2.Sahitivanam-Telugu Literature club

patterns: What is Stentorian ?
What is english literature club in College?
responses: Sentorian is the English literature club of Chandigarh University. It is the place where students meet to read and write.The literary club has been an ongoing and active club for several years.It is based upon using the creativity skills it takes to be a writer.

patterns: What is telugu literature club in Chandigarh University?
What is Sahitivanam in Chandigarh University?
responses:
It is Sahitivanam-Telugu literature club of Chandigarh University,place where students meet to read and write.
 	 	The literary club has been an ongoing and active club for several years.
It is based upon using the creativity skills it takes to be a writer.

patterns: what is the arts club in Chandigarh University?
Creative Arts
responses: Creative Arts- arts club of Chandigarh University.Creative Arts organized different events and activities to bring up ones talent in arts and at the same time it has built the different models at the time of annual fests of Chandigarh University.

patterns: what is the dance club in Chandigarh University?
what is the choreo club in Chandigarh University?
LiveWire
responses:
LiveWire- dance club of Chandigarh University.Livewire is an all-style collegiate dance crew from CUvjeit.
The club has participated in different competitions across India and won several rewards and recognition.

patterns: what is the music club in Chandigarh University?
what is the voice club in Chandigarh University?
Cresendo
responses:
Cresendo-music club of Chandigarh University.Cresendo consists of highly talented keyboard players,guitarists',vocal's,flutists and others.
The club has participated in different competitions across India and won several rewards and recognition.

patterns: what is the photography club in Chandigarh University?
Scintillate
responses: Scinitallate-the offical photography club of Chandigarh University.Club has highly talented people in clicking pictures with perfect detailing and picture quality.Scintillate organized different events like selfie booth and b/w picture at time of annual fests.

patterns: what is the social service club in Chandigarh University?
what is the volunteering club in Chandigarh University?
responses:
is the social club of Chandigarh University.
Nss organised different events like be a teacher,blood donation camp,harithavanam,vertical garden,ganesh idol making,fist full of rice etc.
The club helped many needy people with different activities.

patterns: what is the short film club in Chandigarh University?
Vjteatro
responses:
It is the short film club of Chandigarh University.Vjteatro is the biggest short film college club in Telangana.
It has released different short films like dochay,how I met myself,dope,priya,ek villain etc

patterns: what is the drama club in Chandigarh University?
dramatrix
responses: It is the offical drama club of Chandigarh University.It is the club where actions meets passion and club has done different live performances.

patterns: What are the different departments in Chandigarh University?
Different branches in Chandigarh University?
How many departments are there in Chandigarh University?
responses: There are 9 Departments in Chandigarh University 1)IT 2)CIVIL 3)EEE 4)MECHANICAL 5)ECE 6)CSE 7)EIE 8)AE 9)HUMANITY AND SCIENCES

patterns: what is the admission process at Chandigarh University?
How can I get into Chandigarh University?
responses: A Student at CU can be admitted in 3 ways 1)A-cat(eamcet,spot admissions) 2)B-cat(jee main) 3)Nri(12th marks).Last year cutoff ranks are provided for reference http://www Chandigarh University.ac.in/download/admissions/FIRST_LAST_EAMCET_2019_RANKS.pdf
